channel.title: How to compile on DeltaScape client ? (There's no Compiler in it)
channel.description:
I didn't find any Compiler in DeltaScape client. I just want to compile it to put my IP Address of my server so I don't have to write it. Can you tell me where is the Compiler or give me a good one with it please ?
Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 04:12:09 pm[/size][hr]NVM

item.title: How to compile on DeltaScape client ? (There's no Compiler in it)
item.dc:creator: @ryry871 ryry871
item.description:
@ryry871 wrote:

Here is my client compiler-(oh and if you don’t know what do with it post and I’ll explain it)

@echo off :menu title Ryan's Compiler echo Ryan's Client Compiler echo _-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_- echo ALL ERRORS ARE BELOW! echo _-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_- if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. pause exit

Read full topic
